title: MD
biography: Abdul Qadeer Khan was a Pakistani nuclear physicist and metallurgical engineer. He is colloquially known as the "father of Pakistan's atomic weapons program".
aiSummary: M. A. Q. Khan is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 104 at Surgical Oncology (Member). Has been published in Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology, iScience. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
